questions.question: What is the capital of Sweden?
options: Stockholm is the capital city.
The capital city is Oslo.
Copenhagen is the capital city.
Helsinki is the capital city.

questions.question: Which Swedish car manufacturer is known for its safety features?
options: Saab prioritizes safety in its cars.
Volvo is famous for its safety features.
Koenigsegg is renowned for safety design.
Scania is known for safety engineering.
questions.answer: Volvo is famous for its safety features.

questions.question: What is the currency of Sweden?
options: Euro is the currency used in Sweden.
Swiss franc is the currency of Sweden.
Krona is the currency used in Sweden.
Pound sterling is the currency of Sweden.
questions.answer: Krona is the currency used in Sweden.

questions.question: Which Swedish furniture company is known for its ready-to-assemble furniture?
options: H&M offers ready-to-assemble furniture.
Ikea is famous for its ready-to-assemble furniture.
Clas Ohlson is known for ready-to-assemble furniture.
Jysk is known for ready-to-assemble furniture.
questions.answer: Ikea is famous for its ready-to-assemble furniture.

questions.question: What is the name of the traditional Swedish dish consisting of seasoned raw herring?
options: Smorgasbord is a traditional Swedish dish.
Surstromming is a traditional Swedish dish.
Kottbullar is a traditional Swedish dish.
Raggmunk is a traditional Swedish dish.
questions.answer: Surstromming is a traditional Swedish dish.
